item.title: T-Mobile suffers massive boycott from customers
item.description: T-Mobile has another big problem that threatens to exacerbate recent struggles with customer retention.

item.title: Amazon is selling a 'sleek' $70 magnetic wooden knife block for just $40
item.description: "If you're looking for a functional, heavy, and nice-looking knife block, this is a really good one."

item.title: Fast-growing, cult-favorite chain cuts expansion, ends breakfast
item.description: Cult-favorite restaurant chain pulls back growth plans and drops breakfast amid concerning new challenges.

item.title: Starbucks unveils bold plan to reverse customer behavior shift
item.description: Starbucks has a new fix for a problem it helped create.

item.title: Amazon brings much-needed Prime service to millions of Americans
item.description: Amazon has quietly expanded a service designed to meet a growing need for its members.
